biotools.summary: Multi-query Sequence Blast Output Examination is a program designed for multi-query sequence BLAST output examination. It examines the BLAST output, extracts the informative parameters of BLAST hits, and saves them in tabular form in either text or HTML format. The hit tables are optionally further analyzed with the program to produce subsets of BLAST hits according to user-specified criteria.

bioschemas.name: MuSeqBox
